Text: As it says quality is ok.  Sorry about large file size, but if you want to burn it I would wait for a better copy.  I'm sure aXXo will be putting out a good relese soon.  If you haven't seen it, it is not a bad copy though.  Enjoy.
This movie as well as the other four HP movies is made in UK, not in United States. The sixth and seventh movies will also be made in the UK.

I agree, but the copies distributed in the U.S. and the financing for the films were from 
Warner Bros. just like it says on the dvd or the film when you see it in theaters.  I didn't type anything below.  It's called copy past.  If you still have doubts please look it up yourself.  This info came from Yahoo Movies!
